author: mayanksethi-turing
subject_labels: Use S3 Cross-Region Replication (CRR) with replication time control enabled
Implement bucket versioning on both source and destination buckets
Configure lifecycle policies to transition objects to Glacier after 90 days in the replica bucket
Enable S3 Transfer Acceleration on the source bucket for faster uploads
Set up CloudWatch alarms for replication latency exceeding 15 minutes
Use KMS encryption with different keys in each region
Implement IAM roles with least privilege for replication
Deploy monitoring infrastructure using CloudWatch Logs for replication metrics
